createAutomatedSavingsPlan(string,addres.details: This function creates an automated savings plan for the user, which will automatically save the specified amount at the specified frequency.

params._amount: The amount to be saved in the plan.
params._duration: The duration of the savings plan
params._frequency: The frequency of the savings plan.
params._token: The address of the token to be used for the savings plan.

executeAutomatedSaving(address).details: This function is designed to be called internally or by trusted external contracts

save(string,address,uint256,uint256).details: this function locks a token away to save for a specified duration. The token will be unlocked after the specified duration. It finds the desired token and queries the user's balance to ensure the user has enough and saves it by moving it from the userTokenBalances mapping to the userSavings mapping.

params._amount: The amount of tokens to save
params._duration: The duration for which to save the tokens
params._token: The address of the token to save

withdrawSavings(uint256,bool).details: Allows a user to withdraw their savings from a specific safe.

params._acceptEarlyWithdrawalFee: Boolean indicating whether the user accepts an early withdrawal fee
params._savingsIndex: The index of the safe from which to withdraw savings

createAutomatedSavingsPlan(string,addres.notice: Creates an automated savings plan for the user.

executeAutomatedSaving(address).notice: Executes automated savings for a user

save(string,address,uint256,uint256).notice: Save a specified amount of tokens for a specific duration
